org.docgene.model

Class XMLDisambArticle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docgene.model.AbstractXMLParent
      • org.docgene.model.AbstractXMLParentArticle
        • org.docgene.model.XMLDisambArticle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.docgene.model.Article, org.docgene.model.HTMLOutput, XMLParent, XMLParentArticle

    public class XMLDisambArticle
extends org.docgene.model.AbstractXMLParentArticle
    Represents an XML disambiguation article.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  XMLDisambArticle.Element
      A disambiguation element points to an article which will be presented in the list of disambiguated articles.
